sentences.en: a test of both oral and written French
Few riddles collected from oral tradition, however, have all six parts.
sentences.cn: 但是据收集的情况看,口头流传的谜语很少具有这完整的六部分.

sentences.en: He passed his French oral examination.
His grammar and syntax, both in oral and written expression, were much better than the average.
sentences.cn: 无论口头还是笔头，他的文法和句法都非常出众。

sentences.en: I spoke privately to the candidate after the oral.
sentences.cn: 口试后，我私下里与那位考生谈了谈。

sentences.en: Many burned patients will take oral fluid and regulate their own intake.
sentences.cn: 多数烧伤病人将经口饮水,而且自己调节入量.

sentences.en: Most folktales eventually move from oral tradition to written form.
sentences.cn: 大多数的民俗故事最终会从口头传统演变成文字形式.

sentences.en: No oral test will be required for admission to that university.
sentences.cn: 上那所大学不必经过口试.

sentences.en: Other things, like legal processes, are largely traditional, but not oral.
sentences.cn: 反之,另一些形式, 如法律程序, 在很大程度上具有传统性, 但不具备口头性.

sentences.en: Painful typhoid injections are a thing of the past, thanks to the introduction of an oral vaccine.
sentences.cn: 自从发明了口服疫苗后，令人痛苦的伤寒疫苗注射就成为了过去。

sentences.en: Particular emphasis will be placed on oral language training.
sentences.cn: 将会特别强调口语训练。

sentences.en: The candidate will take an oral examination.
sentences.cn: 那个应试者将参加口试.

sentences.en: The oral message was incorrectly transmitted.
The story of King Arthur became part of oral tradition.
sentences.cn: 亚瑟王的故事成为口头传说的一部分。

phrases.tran_cn: 口述历史；口述历史的笔录或是录音带
口头报告；口头陈述；口头演讲

trans.tran_cn: 口头的，口述的，口服的，属于或关于嘴的，构成或使用言语的

trans.tran_en: a spoken test, especially in a foreign language
